description: A Java class defining REST API endpoints for managing notes in a personal notes application, including CRUD operations.

classes.name: NoteController
classes.description: REST controller providing CRUD endpoints for notes

methods.name: listNotes
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list all notes, optionally filtered by userId.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new note with provided title and content.

methods.name: getNote
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a specific note by its ID.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update an existing note.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a note by its ID.
